user_profiles.name: admin
user_profiles.comment: Administrator that can add and change verbs and sees the code_id

user_profiles.name: developer
user_profiles.comment: Can see all errors and change the status of the errors, but cannot access the production system

user_profiles.name: system test
user_profiles.comment: for integration tests that should never be shown to the user but is used to check if integration test data is completely removed after the tests

user_profiles.name: system
user_profiles.comment: User to log internal tasks not directly initiated by an user like system testing and cleanup

phrase_types.name: standard
phrase_types.comment: for words that have need no special behaviour

phrase_types.name: time
phrase_types.comment: A time word defines the time period for which a value is valid and values with a time can be used to display time series.

phrase_types.name: measure type
phrase_types.comment: a measure word such as meter, kilogram, ...

phrase_types.name: time jump
phrase_types.comment: these terms describes a change of a timestamp term

phrase_types.name: calc
phrase_types.comment: a calculated word in R; e.g. this year returns always a different term

phrase_types.name: format percent
phrase_types.comment: terms that forces the result to be formatted in percent

phrase_types.name: scaling
phrase_types.comment: a scaling word such as millions, one, ...

phrase_types.name: hidden scaling
phrase_types.comment: "one" is needed as a scaling word for correct calculations, but it is not useful to display it

phrase_types.name: view / layer
phrase_types.comment:
word to separate the number layers and to change the view.
E.g. -as reported- are exactly the numbers as they come from the external source
-detailed- are the most granular splitting of the -as reported- numbers
-projection- show the changes and includes the estimates to make a forecast

phrase_types.name: formula link
phrase_types.comment: A term with the same name as a formula, because some values can be calculated and can nevertheless be overwritten

phrase_types.name: differentiator filler
phrase_types.comment: these terms are used to fill up a differentiator list, so most likely the term linked will be named "other"

phrase_types.name: this
phrase_types.comment: not sure, why this is needed

phrase_types.name: next
phrase_types.comment: not sure, why this is needed

phrase_types.name: prior
phrase_types.comment: not sure, why this is needed

phrase_types.name: scaling word percent
phrase_types.comment: all words that represent percent

phrase_types.name: scaled measure
phrase_types.comment: a combination of scaling and measure e.g. 100ml

phrase_types.name: math constant
phrase_types.comment: A mathematical constant is a key number whose value is fixed by an unambiguous definition

phrase_types.name: measure divisor
phrase_types.comment: a measure divisor like per year, per kg, ...

phrase_types.name: latest
phrase_types.comment: to select the latest value by a time jump type e.g. latest year

phrase_types.name: key
phrase_types.comment: force faster search and if two keys are connected with the verb is all child values are expected to be equal

phrase_types.name: information
phrase_types.comment: this phrase is used mainly for information purpose and for the selection the program tries to another search without this phrase

formula_types.name: next
formula_types.comment: time jump forward: replaces a time term with the next time term based on the verb follower. E.g. "2017" "next" would lead to use "2018"

formula_types.name: prior
formula_types.comment: time jump backward: replaces a time term with the previous time term based on the verb follower. E.g. "2017" "next" would lead to use "2016"

formula_types.name: reversible
formula_types.comment: a formula that can ba included also in the reversed version e.g. "minute = second / 60" and "second = minute * 60"

formula_link_types.name: time period based
formula_link_types.comment: increase needs to know for which time period the increase should be calculated

formula_element_types.name: word
formula_element_types.comment: a reference to a word used to select values using "and"

formula_element_types.name: formula
formula_element_types.comment: to select the results of another formula using the given context

formula_element_types.name: triple
formula_element_types.comment: a reference to two predicate linked words used to select values using "and"

view_types.name: standard
view_types.comment: the base display mask without additional functionalities

view_types.name: entry view
view_types.comment: these masks are used for the zukunft.com entry page. If a totally new user opens zukunft.com the first time, he will see a random mask of this type.

view_types.name: edit
view_types.comment: a edit mask that is used to change data

view_types.name: word default
view_types.comment: a default mask for new words

view_types.name: details
view_types.comment: to show the more details than the standard view

component_types.name: view selector
component_types.comment: to select an existing mask e.g. to set the default view

component_types.name: text
component_types.comment: simply to display a variable text

component_types.name: fixed word
component_types.comment: just display a word as a text

component_types.name: linked word
component_types.comment: display a word and offer a link

component_types.name: formula results
component_types.comment: show the results of a formula

component_types.name: word list up
component_types.comment: Show a list of words related with a specified verb e.g. for the triple <Canton of Zurich> show the word <canton>, because they are linked with verb <is a>

component_types.name: word name
component_types.comment: show the word name and give the user the possibility to change the word name

component_types.name: word list down
component_types.comment: Show a list of words related with a specified verb e.g. for word <canton> list <Canton of Zurich> and others, because they are linked with verb <is a>

component_types.name: all relations
component_types.comment: show the complete list of all relations

component_types.name: values related to
component_types.comment: display all values that are related to a defined term

component_types.name: formulas
component_types.comment: show all related formulas

component_types.name: word value list
component_types.comment: A list of words with some key values e.g. a company list with the PE ratio

component_types.name: XML export
component_types.comment: offer to configure and start the XML export of a phrase and all related words, numbers and formulas

component_types.name: CSV export
component_types.comment: to define the main phrase, the column and row for the CSV export

component_types.name: JSON Export
component_types.comment: To start or configure the JSON export

component_types.name: system form title
component_types.comment: a form title only allowed for system views where the user can only change the order

component_types.name: system form hidden back stack
component_types.comment: the hidden form field with the back stack only allowed for system views where the user can only change the order

component_types.name: system form confirm status
component_types.comment: the hidden form field for the user confirm status only allowed for system views where the user can only change the order

component_types.name: form field name
component_types.comment: the form field for the name of a word or formula

component_types.name: form field description
component_types.comment: the form field for the description of a word or formula

component_types.name: button cancel
component_types.comment: a button of a form to cancel the form action

component_types.name: button save
component_types.comment: a button of a form to save the changes to the database

component_types.name: form end
component_types.comment: just to indicate that a form ends

component_position_types.name: side
component_position_types.comment: is right of the previous entry (or left for right to left languages)

share_types.name: public
share_types.comment: value can be seen and used by everyone (default)

share_types.name: personal
share_types.comment: value can be seen by everyone, but is linked to the user

share_types.name: group
share_types.comment: only a closed group of users can seen and use the values

share_types.name: private
share_types.comment: only the user itself can see und use the value

protection_types.name: user
protection_types.comment: only users with a login and a confirmed email can take over the ownership

protection_types.name: admin
protection_types.comment: only user with admin permission can take the ownership

protection_types.name: no change
protection_types.comment: no change of the ownership is allowed

languages.name: English
languages.comment: the system language, so each word must be unique for all users in this language

languages.name: UK English
languages.comment: the users can use this (and the other) languages to create its own namespace. So one user may use "Zurich" in UK English for "Kanton Zurich" and another user may use "Zurich" in UK English for "Zurich AG".

sys_log_stati.name: new
sys_log_stati.comment: the error has just being logged and no one has yet looked at it

sys_log_stati.name: assigned
sys_log_stati.comment: A developer is looking at the error.

sys_log_stati.name: resolved
sys_log_stati.comment: the error is supposed to be corrected

sys_log_stati.name: closed
sys_log_stati.comment: a second person (other than the developer) has confirmed that the problem is solved.

job_types.name: update value
job_types.comment: if a value is updated all the depending results should be calculated again

job_types.name: add value
job_types.comment: 1. check if used in formulas and if yes, create new formula results\r\n2. calculate the new formula results

job_types.name: exclude a value
job_types.comment: check if used for a formula result and if yes either remove the formula result or update it

job_types.name: initial import
job_types.comment: import the base configuration by a system user on initial setup

verbs.name: not set
verbs.comment: placeholder verb to enable foreign key checks in the database and for the selection

verbs.name: is a
verbs.comment: the main child to parent relation e.g. Zurich is a Canton. The reverse is valid and usually plural is used e.g. Cantons are Zurich, Bern, ...

verbs.name: is part of
verbs.comment: if several similar term create different views to the same sum; E.g. Cash Flow Paper, Balance Sheet and Income statement are Financial Statements. Or Sectors and Regions are different splittings

verbs.name: with
verbs.comment: similar to 'is part of' but where the left phrase is expected to be several times the right phrase e.g. for comparing same by same: 1 hour with full load is the same as 2 hours with half load

verbs.name: is time jump for
verbs.comment: is the default time jump for

verbs.name: is term jump for
verbs.comment: is the default term jump for

verbs.name: term type needed
verbs.comment: the formula needs the linked term type

verbs.name: is measure type for
verbs.comment: is the default measure type for

verbs.name: can be used as a differentiator for
verbs.comment: similar to contains, but in a table view the row will not be shown if there is no corresponding value

verbs.name: can use
verbs.comment: use indicates that a new result is created e.g. a turbine can use water or wind or any type of liquid or gas to convert energy

verbs.name: scaled by
verbs.comment: to define the usual scaling e.g. for watt hours usually the scaling kilo (kWh) is used

verbs.name: per
verbs.comment: to define the usual quotient e.g. meter per second is normally used not seconds per meter, that why the reverse name is empty

system_views.name: Start view
system_views.description: A dynamic start mask that shows a interesting fact

system_views.name: Search
system_views.description: The search page for all words and formulas

system_views.name: Delete Formula
system_views.description: To confirm the exclusion or deleting of a formula

system_views.name: Verb List
system_views.description: List all available ways how to link two words

system_views.name: Error Log
system_views.description: simple confirm page for a new error that has been logged in the database

system_views.name: System Error List
system_views.description: List the system errors and allow the user to change the status

system_views.name: Import
system_views.description: Select a file to import data

system_views.name: Delete View Component
system_views.description: Exclude or delete a view component
